definitions.definition: The system of seven tones built on a tonic key ; the 24 major and minor scales .
A sound of specific pitch and quality ; timbre .
The quality of all the tones in a composition heard in relation to the tonic.
The interrelation of the tones in a painting .

main_definition: ( music ) The system of seven tones built on a tonic key ; the 24 major and minor scales .
secondary_definitions: ( music ) A sound of specific pitch and quality ; timbre .
( music ) The quality of all the tones in a composition heard in relation to the tonic.
The interrelation of the tones in a painting .
